original_text: And if any man lie with her at all, and her flowers be upon him, he shall be unclean seven days; and all the bed whereon he lieth shall be unclean.
korean_text: 누구든지 이 여인과 동침하여 그의 불결함에 전염되면 이레 동안 부정할 것이라 그가 눕는 침상은 다 부정하니라

sentences.original_text: And if any man lie with her at all
and her flowers be upon him
he shall be unclean seven days
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이레 동안 부정하게 될 것이요

sentences.original_text: and all the bed whereon he lieth
